HotkeyScript.name: PauseHotkey
HotkeyScript.script: if not $cavebot or not $targeting then listas('Enabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('on') settargeting('on') wait(1000) else listas('Disabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('off') settargeting('off') stopattack() wait(1000) end

PersistentScript.name: SetupScript_ib
PersistentScript.script:
-- V3ND1CAT0R5 ~~ S E T T I N G S ~~ 5CR1PT5
-------- Backpack Options -------- mainbp = "demon backpack" -- anas/gsp bp [pick & need bp with golden mug] manabp = "jewelled backpack" -- bps for runes lootbp = "dragon backpack" -- bp for loot goldbp = "brocade backpack" -- bp for gold
maindp = "crown backpack" -- principal bp in the depot stackdp = "golden backpack" -- bp inside "maindp" for stack items nostackdp = "orange backpack" -- bp inside "maindp" for nostack items
-------- Supplies Options -------- mananame = "mana potion" --nombre de mana potion manaamount = 1400 --cantidad de mana a comprar
healthname = "ultimate health potion" --nombre de health potion healthamount = 100 --cantidad de health potion
otherhealthname = "great health potion" --nombre de segunda health potion otherhealthamount = 80 --cantidad de segunda health potio
manaleave = 280 --cantidad de mana para salir capleave = 80 --cap para salir healthleave = 15 -- health potion para salir otherhealthleave = 10 -- segunda health potion para salir
-------- respawn optios ------ exoriamount = 3 -- cantidad de monsters para exori
exorigranamount = 3 -- cantidad de monsters para exori gran
exorigran2amount = 5 -- cantidad de other monsters para exori gran
exori2amount = 5 -- cantidad de other monsters para exori
exoriminamount = 3 -- cantidad de monsters para lanzar exori min
utito = false -- para hacer utito tempo
utitoamount = 5 -- cantidad de monsters para hacer utito
ssdeath = true -- tomar foto al morir
lure = true -- hardcore = true lvl 210+ /normal = false leavel 170+
-- pick,rope [ALWAYS CARRY A MACHETE][SIEMPRE TENER MACHETE] -- NEED A BP OF ANY COLOR THAT DIDNT USE WITH GOLDEN MUGS -- NECESITA BP DE COLOR QUE NO HALLA USADO CON GOLDEN MUGS -------------------DESACTIVAR / PAUSE SCRIPT ------------------- -- abrir/open -- Extras -- States -- Quitar primero action y luego el cavebot etc.. -- First desactive Actions and then desactive cavebot etc.. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

PersistentScript.name: BPS
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) if windowcount_ib() < 4 then pausewalking(10000)
if windowcount_ib(mainbp) < 1 and not ($lootbodies>0) then wait(500) openitem(mainbp, "back") wait(1000) resizewindows() wait(1000) end
if windowcount_ib(lootbp) < 1 and not ($lootbodies>0) then wait(500) openitem(lootbp, mainbp, true) wait(1000) resizewindows() end
if windowcount_ib(goldbp) < 1 and not ($lootbodies>0) then wait(500) openitem(goldbp, mainbp, true) wait(1000) resizewindows() end
if windowcount_ib(manabp) < 1 and not ($lootbodies>0) then wait(500) openitem(manabp,mainbp, true) wait(1000) resizewindows() end
wait(500) pausewalking(0) end

PersistentScript.name: reconnect
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) ----------------- V3ND1CAT0R5 R3C0N3CT V 1.0
if $connected and not $cavebot then setcavebot("on") end if $connected and not $looting then setlooting("on") end if $connected and not $targeting then settargeting("on") end
local accname = ("abc") -- account name local accpass = ("123") -- account password local charname = ("Ab Cd") -- character name
if $connected == false then setcavebot("off") setlooting("off") settargeting("off") wait(1000) connect(accname, accpass, charname) wait(600, 1800) pausewalking(10000) end
local templerange = 7 local templenpc = {"Alia", "Tyrias", "Brewster", "Rahkem", "Kasmir", "Amanda", "Isimov", "Yberius", "Maealil", "Quentin", "Lynda", "Lorietta", "Prezil", "Kjesse", "Asralius"}
if (($pzone == true) and (maround_ib(10, false, unpack(templenpc)) >= 1) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32787, 31276, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32595, 32744, 6, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33213, 32454, 1, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32213, 31133, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33004, 31490, 11, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32649, 31925, 11, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33217, 31814, 8, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32317, 32826, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33194, 32853, 8, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32369, 32241, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32360, 31782, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32957, 32076, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32732, 31634, 7, templerange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33447, 31323, 9, templerange))) then wait(1500) closeclient() wait(1500) messagebox("Reconnect Message: Tibia client has been closed because character was inside a temple. This is to protect your character from being killed by other players.") end

PersistentScript.name: pots al piso
PersistentScript.script: auto(800, 1000) if itemcount(283, 'all') >= 50 or itemcount(284, 'all') >= 50 or itemcount(285, 'all') >= 50 or itemcount(286, 'all') >= 50 or $cap < 150 then dropitems(283,284,285,286) end

PersistentScript.name: pots al bp
PersistentScript.script: auto(200, 400) if windowcount_ib(manabp) == 1 and ((getcontainer_ib(manabp).maxslots - getcontainer_ib(manabp).usedslots) > 0) then moveitems(mananame,manabp, nil, 100) moveitems(healthname,manabp, nil, 100) moveitems(otherhealthname,manabp, nil, 100) end

PersistentScript.name: hardcore changer
PersistentScript.script: auto(1000, 1500) -- V3ND1CAT0R5 5P3115 51NCR0N153R V 2.0 if lure and paround(10) >= 1 or not lure then setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Distance","0") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Stance","Reach") elseif lure and paround(10) == 0 then setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Stance","Lure & Stand") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Distance","5") end

PersistentScript.name: afk
PersistentScript.script: auto(8000, 10000) if $standtime > 15000 and maround_ib(7) > 0 then setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/all*/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "no") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category B*/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "no") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Stance","Reach") else setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/all*/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "yes") setsetting("Targeting/Creatures/Category B*/Setting*/OnlyIfTrapped", "yes") end

PersistentScript.name: exoris
PersistentScript.script:
auto(400, 450) ----------------- V3ND1CAT0R5 5P3115 51NCR0N153R V 2.0 local creatures = {"dragon lord","dragon lord hatchling"} local creatures2 = {"dragon","dragon hatchling"}
if (iscreatureontile($posx, $posy-1, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx-1, $posy-1, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx+1, $posy-1, $posz)) and maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= exoriminamount and cancastspell("exori min") then turn("n") wait(100, 150) cast("exori min") wait(150,200) end
if (iscreatureontile($posx-1, $posy, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx-1, $posy-1, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx-1, $posy+1, $posz)) and maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= exoriminamount and cancastspell("exori min") then turn("w") wait(100, 150) cast("exori min") wait(150,200) end
if (iscreatureontile($posx, $posy+1, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx-1, $posy+1, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx+1, $posy+1, $posz)) and maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= exoriminamount and cancastspell("exori min") then turn("s") wait(100, 150) cast("exori min") wait(150,200) end
if (iscreatureontile($posx+1, $posy, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx+1, $posy-1, $posz) and iscreatureontile($posx+1, $posy+1, $posz)) and maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= exoriminamount and cancastspell("exori min") then turn("e") wait(100, 150) cast("exori min") wait(150,200) end
if utito and not $strenghtened and maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= utitoamount and cancastspell("utito tempo") then cast("utito tempo") end
if maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= exoriamount and cancastspell("exori") then cast("exori") end
if maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures)) >= exorigranamount and cancastspell("exori gran") then cast("exori gran") end
if maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures2)) >= exori2amount and cancastspell("exori") then cast("exori") end
if maround_ib(1,unpack(creatures2)) >= exorigran2amount and cancastspell("exori gran") then cast("exori gran") end

PersistentScript.name: lootdestination
PersistentScript.script:
auto(4000, 5000)
--To Loot Backpack setsetting("Looting/LootList/small sapphire/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/life crystal/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/tower shield/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/dragon slayer/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/royal helmet/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/dragon scale mail/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/fire sword/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/golden mug/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/red dragon leather/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/red dragon scale/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/dragon shield/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/dragon hammer/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/wand of inferno/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/serpent sword/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/dragonbone staff/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/dragon lord trophy/Destination", lootbp) setsetting("Looting/LootList/magma boots/Destination", lootbp) --To Gold Backpack setsetting("Looting/LootList/gold coin/Destination", goldbp)

PersistentScript.name: safe bank
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000)
foreach newmessage MESSAGES "NPCs" do if (MESSAGES.text:find("There is not enough gold on your account.")) then setcavebot("off") wait(5000, 10000) closeclient() end end

PersistentScript.name: moneytobp
PersistentScript.script: auto(5000, 8000) if windowcount_ib(goldbp) == 1 then moveitems("crystal coin",goldbp,nil, 100) moveitems("gold coin",goldbp,nil, 100) moveitems("platinum coin",goldbp,nil, 100) end

PersistentScript.name: anti furitrunetrap
PersistentScript.script: auto(800, 1000) if ($standtime > 60000) then antifurnituretrap() wait(5000) end

PersistentScript.name: ssdeath
PersistentScript.script: auto(800, 1000) if $hppc < 10 and $connected and ssdeath then screenshot($name.." "..string.gsub(currentdate(), "/", "_").." "..string.gsub(currenttime(), ":", ".")) wait(3000) end

PersistentScript.name: lowstamina
PersistentScript.script: auto(800, 1000) if (($pzone == true) and ($stamina <= 930)) then wait(1000, 1500) closeclient() end

HUDScript.name: GeneralInfo
HUDScript.script:
setfontcolor("white")
addtext($name,10,30) addtext("LvL :", 150,30) addtext($level, 180,30) addtext("Next LvL :", 150,45) addtext(exptolevel(), 210,45)
addtext("Pos X : ", 10,45) addtext($posx, 54,45) addtext("Pos Y : ", 10,60) addtext($posy, 54,60) addtext("Pos Z : ", 10,75) addtext($posz, 54,75)

HUDScript.name: propiedades
HUDScript.script:
local CONFIG = { DRAW_TYPE = "border", POSITION = {X = 10, Y = 30}, TEXT_DISTANCE = 130, LINE_DISTANCE = 14, }
function formatnumber(NUMBER, SEPARATOR) local SEPARATOR, RESULT, SIGN, BEFORE, AFTER = SEPARATOR or ",", '', string.match(tostring(NUMBER), '^([%+%-]?)(%d*)(%.?.*)$') while (#BEFORE > 3) do RESULT = SEPARATOR .. string.sub(BEFORE, -3, -1) .. RESULT BEFORE = string.sub(BEFORE, 1, -4) end return SIGN .. BEFORE .. RESULT .. AFTER end
--[[ JUST EDIT BELOW THIS LINE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING ]]--
HUD = {
TITLE = "HUD ~~ V3ND1CAT0R5 ~~ HUD",
SECTIONS = { { NAME = "GENERAL INFORMATION", ELEMENTS = { {"Level: ", string.format("%s", $level)}, {"HP: ", string.format("%s (%s)%%", $hp, $hppc)}, {"MP: ", string.format("%s (%s)%%", $mp, $mppc)}, {"Capacity: ", string.format("%s", $cap)}, {"Experience: ", string.format("%s", formatnumber($exp))}, {"Exp/h (Tibia):", string.format("%s", formatnumber($clientexphour))}, {"Exp/h (Bot): ", string.format("%s", formatnumber($exphour))}, {"Exp Gained: ", string.format("%s", formatnumber($expgained))}, {"Exp to Level: ", string.format("%s", formatnumber((50 / 3 * (($level + 1) ^ 3 - 6 * ($level + 1) ^ 2 + 17 * ($level + 1) - 12)) - $exp))}, {"Time To Level:", string.format("%s", time($timetonextlevel))}, {"Time Online: ", string.format("%s", time($hunttime/1000))}, {"Stamina: ", string.format("%.2d:%.2d", $stamina / 60, $stamina % 60)}, {"Coordinates: ", string.format("%s | %s | %s", $posx, $posy, $posz)}, {"Balance: ", string.format("%s", formatnumber($balance):gsub("-1", "Unknown"))}, {"Cursor ID: ", string.format("%s", $cursorinfo.id)}, }, },
{ NAME = "ENGINES", ELEMENTS = { {"Alarms: ", string.format("%s", (getsetting("Alerts/DisableSounds") == "yes" and "Activated") or "Deactivated")}, {"Healer: ", string.format("%s", (getsetting("SpellHealer/Enabled") == "yes" and "Activated") or "Deactivated")}, {"Cavebot: ", string.format("%s", (getsetting("Cavebot/Enabled") == "yes" and "Activated") or "Deactivated")}, {"Looting: ", string.format("%s", (getsetting("Looting/Enabled") == "yes" and "Activated") or "Deactivated")}, {"Targeting: ", string.format("%s", (getsetting("Targeting/Enabled") == "yes" and "Activated") or "Deactivated")}, }, }, },
COLORS = {SHADOW = -16119286, TITLE = -98718255, TEXT1 = -1, TEXT2 = -2968436, SUBTITLE = -33024, BUTTON_ON = -9320847, BUTTON_OFF = -3342336},
VERSION = "1.0" }
--[[ DON'T EDIT BELOW THIS LINE ]]--
function addcustomtext(TEXT, X, Y, COLOR) setfontcolor(color(10, 10, 10)) if CONFIG.DRAW_TYPE:upper() == "SHADOW" then addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y + 1) elseif CONFIG.DRAW_TYPE:upper() == "BORDER" then addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y + 1) addtext(TEXT, X - 1, Y - 1) addtext(TEXT, X - 1, Y + 1) addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y - 1) addtext(TEXT, X, Y + 1) addtext(TEXT, X, Y - 1) addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y) addtext(TEXT, X - 1, Y) end setfontcolor(COLOR) return addtext(TEXT, X, Y) end
setposition(CONFIG.POSITION.X, CONFIG.POSITION.Y)
local Y, X = 0, 0
addcustomtext(HUD.TITLE, X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TITLE)
for _, SECTION in ipairs(HUD.SECTIONS) do Y = Y + 20 addcustomtext(SECTION.NAME, X, Y, HUD.COLORS.SUBTITLE) Y = Y + 20 for _, ELEMENT in ipairs(SECTION.ELEMENTS) do addcustomtext(ELEMENT[1], X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT1) addcustomtext(ELEMENT[2], X + CONFIG.TEXT_DISTANCE, Y, (ELEMENT[2] == "Activated" and HUD.COLORS.BUTTON_ON) or (ELEMENT[2] == "Deactivated" and HUD.COLORS.BUTTON_OFF) or HUD.COLORS.TEXT2) Y = Y + CONFIG.LINE_DISTANCE end end

HUDScript.name: loot counter
HUDScript.script:
local CONFIG = { DRAW_TYPE = "border", ORIENTATION = "right", POSITION = {X = 0, Y = 0}, MAX_TEXT_LENGTH = 17, TEXT_DISTANCE = 130, LINE_DISTANCE = 14, }
HUD = {
TITLE = "HUD ~~ V3ND1CAT0R5 ~~ HUD",
ITEMS = {
LOOT = { {NAME = "Gold Coin", VALUE = 1}, {NAME = "small sapphire", VALUE = 200}, {NAME = "life crystal", VALUE = 500}, {NAME = "tower shield", VALUE = 8000}, {NAME = "dragon slayer", VALUE = 16000}, {NAME = "royal helmet", VALUE = 30000}, {NAME = "dragon scale mail", VALUE = 45000}, {NAME = "fire sword", VALUE = 4000}, {NAME = "golden mug", VALUE = 250}, {NAME = "red dragon leather", VALUE = 100}, {NAME = "red dragon scale", VALUE = 150}, {NAME = "dragon shield", VALUE = 4000}, {NAME = "dragon hammer", VALUE = 2000}, {NAME = "wand of inferno", VALUE = 3000}, {NAME = "serpent sword", VALUE = 1000}, {NAME = "dragonbone staff", VALUE = 3000}, {NAME = "dragon lord trophy", VALUE = 10000}, {NAME = "magma boots", VALUE = 2500}, {NAME = "strong health potion", VALUE = 100}, },
SUPPLY = { {NAME = "Mana Potion", VALUE = 50}, {NAME = "Great Health Potion", VALUE = 190}, {NAME = "ultimate Health Potion", VALUE = 190}, } },
COLORS = {SHADOW = -16119286, TITLE = -98718255, TEXT1 = -1, TEXT2 = -2968436, SUBTITLE = -33024, PROFIT = -9320847, WASTE = -3342336},
VERSION = "1.0" }
--[[ DONT EDIT NOTHING BELOW THIS LINE --]]
function formatnumber(n, s) local result, sign, before, after = '', string.match(tostring(n), '^([%+%-]?)(%d*)(%.?.*)$')
while #before > 3 do result = (s or '.') .. string.sub(before, -3, -1) .. result before = string.sub(before, 1, -4) end
return sign .. before .. result .. after end
function addcustomtext(TEXT, X, Y, COLOR) setfontcolor(color(10, 10, 10)) if CONFIG.DRAW_TYPE:upper() == "SHADOW" then addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y + 1) elseif CONFIG.DRAW_TYPE:upper() == "BORDER" then addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y + 1) addtext(TEXT, X - 1, Y - 1) addtext(TEXT, X - 1, Y + 1) addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y - 1) addtext(TEXT, X, Y + 1) addtext(TEXT, X, Y - 1) addtext(TEXT, X + 1, Y) addtext(TEXT, X - 1, Y) end setfontcolor(COLOR) return addtext(TEXT, X, Y) end
local X, Y, INDEX, TOTAL, TOTAL_LOOTED, TOTAL_WASTED = (CONFIG.ORIENTATION:lower() == "right" and $worldwinrelative.right + 10 or $clientwin.left + 10) + CONFIG.POSITION.X, $worldwinrelative.top + 20 + CONFIG.POSITION.Y, 1, 0, 0, 0
addcustomtext(HUD.TITLE, X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TITLE)
Y = Y + 20
addcustomtext("ITEMS LOOTED:", X, Y, HUD.COLORS.SUBTITLE)
Y = Y + 5
for _, ITEM in ipairs(HUD.ITEMS.LOOT) do local ITEM_LOOTED = getitems_ib(itemid(ITEM.NAME)) if ITEM_LOOTED[ITEM_LOOTED.count - 1].loot > 0 then Y = Y + CONFIG.LINE_DISTANCE addcustomtext((#ITEM.NAME < CONFIG.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH and ITEM.NAME or ITEM.NAME:sub(1, CONFIG.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH) .. "..."):gsub("(%a)([%w_']*)", function(s1, s2) return s1:upper() .. s2:lower() end), X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT1) addcustomtext(string.format("%s (%sk)", formatnumber(ITEM_LOOTED[0].loot), math.floor(ITEM_LOOTED[0].loot * (ITEM.VALUE or itemvalue(ITEM.NAME)) / 100) / 10), X + CONFIG.TEXT_DISTANCE, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT2) TOTAL, TOTAL_LOOTED = TOTAL + ITEM_LOOTED[0].loot * (ITEM.VALUE or itemvalue(ITEM.NAME)), TOTAL_LOOTED + (ITEM_LOOTED[0].loot * (ITEM.VALUE or itemvalue(ITEM.NAME))) end end
Y = Y + 20
addcustomtext("Total: ", X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT2) addcustomtext(formatnumber(TOTAL_LOOTED) .. " GPs", X + CONFIG.TEXT_DISTANCE, Y, HUD.COLORS.TITLE)
Y = Y + 25
addcustomtext("ITEMS USED:", X, Y, HUD.COLORS.SUBTITLE)
Y = Y + 5
for _, ITEM in ipairs(HUD.ITEMS.SUPPLY) do local ITEM_USED = getitems_ib(itemid(ITEM.NAME)) if ITEM_USED[ITEM_USED.count - 1].usage > 0 then Y = Y + CONFIG.LINE_DISTANCE
addcustomtext((#ITEM.NAME < CONFIG.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH and ITEM.NAME or ITEM.NAME:sub(1, CONFIG.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH) .. "..."):gsub("(%a)([%w_']*)", function(s1, s2) return s1:upper() .. s2:lower() end), X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT1) addcustomtext(string.format("%s (%sk)", formatnumber(ITEM_USED[0].usage), math.floor(ITEM_USED[0].usage * (ITEM.VALUE or itemvalue(ITEM.NAME)) / 100) / 10), X + CONFIG.TEXT_DISTANCE, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT2) TOTAL, TOTAL_WASTED = TOTAL - ITEM_USED[0].usage * (ITEM.VALUE or itemvalue(ITEM.NAME)), TOTAL_WASTED + (ITEM_USED[0].usage * (ITEM.VALUE or itemvalue(ITEM.NAME))) end end
Y = Y + 20
addcustomtext("Total: ", X, Y, HUD.COLORS.TEXT2) addcustomtext("-" .. formatnumber(TOTAL_WASTED) .. " GPs", X + CONFIG.TEXT_DISTANCE, Y, HUD.COLORS.TITLE)
Y = Y + 25
addcustomtext(TOTAL_LOOTED - TOTAL_WASTED >= 0 and "Profit:" or "Waste:", X, Y, TOTAL_LOOTED - TOTAL_WASTED >= 0 and HUD.COLORS.PROFIT or HUD.COLORS.WASTE) addcustomtext(string.format("%s GPs (%s k/h)", formatnumber(TOTAL_LOOTED - TOTAL_WASTED), math.floor(((TOTAL_LOOTED - TOTAL_WASTED) / (tosec_ib(time($hunttime/1000)) / 3600)) / 100) / 10), X + CONFIG.TEXT_DISTANCE, Y, TOTAL_LOOTED - TOTAL_WASTED >= 0 and HUD.COLORS.PROFIT or HUD.COLORS.WASTE)

KeyboardOption.stuckCtrlShiftPolicy: If Cavebot on, Release after 1 sec

Waypoint.label: w322
Waypoint.script: if $posz == 7 then gotolabel("w377") elseif $posz == 14 or $posz == 15 then gotolabel("w199") end

Waypoint.label: w010
w012
Waypoint.script: say("Hi") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Deposit all") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Yes") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Withdraw 110000") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Yes") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("balance") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Bye") wait(2000,2500)

Waypoint.label: w014
Waypoint.script: if itemcount("crystal coin", 'all') < 11 or itemcount("gold coin", 'all') > 0 then gotolabel("bank") else gotolabel("irpots") end

Waypoint.label: w021
Waypoint.script: if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("irpots") else wait(1000) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/BPS/Enabled", "no") wait(1500) setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "no") wait(1000) closewindows(lootbp, true) wait(800) closewindows(goldbp, true) end

Waypoint.label: w025
Waypoint.script: if not islocation(2) then gotolabel("w022") else wait(1000) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/BPS/Enabled", "no") wait(500) setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "no") wait(1000) closewindows(lootbp, true) wait(800) closewindows(goldbp, true) end

Waypoint.label: w027
Waypoint.script:
if windowcount_ib(mainbp) < 1 and not ($lootbodies>0) then wait(500) openitem(mainbp, "back") wait(1000) resizewindows() wait(1000) end
if windowcount_ib(manabp) < 1 and not ($lootbodies>0) then wait(500) openitem(manabp,mainbp, true) wait(1000) resizewindows() end say("Hi") wait(1500,2500) npcsay("trade") wait(4500,6000) sellflasks() buyitemsupto(mananame, manaamount) buyitemsupto(healthname, healthamount) buyitemsupto(otherhealthname, otherhealthamount)
wait(3000) npcsay("bye")

Waypoint.label: w031
w039
Waypoint.script: if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("w034") else setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/BPS/Enabled", "yes") wait(1000) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/BPS/Enabled", "yes") setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "yes") wait(1000) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/lootdestination/Enabled", "no") end

Waypoint.label: w032
Waypoint.script: wait(10000) if itemcount(mananame, 'all') < manaamount or itemcount(healthname, 'all') < healthamount or itemcount(otherhealthname, 'all') < otherhealthamount then gotolabel("w022") else gotolabel("bps") end

Waypoint.label: w050
w052
Waypoint.script: say("Hi") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Deposit all") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Yes") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Withdraw 2500") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Yes") wait(2000,2500) npcsay("Balance") wait(1500) npcsay("Bye") wait(2000,2500) if itemcount("platinum coin", 'all') < 25 then gotolabel("w051") end

Waypoint.label: w063
Waypoint.script: if not islocation(4) then gotolabel("w053") else wait(1500) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/BPS/Enabled", "yes") wait(500) setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "yes") wait(500) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/BPS/Enabled", "yes") wait(500) setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "yes") wait(500) setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/lootdestination/Enabled", "no") wait(500) cast("utani hur") end

Waypoint.script: if itemcount(mananame, 'all') <= manaleave or itemcount(healthname, 'all') <= healthleave or itemcount(otherhealthname, 'all') <= otherhealthleave or $cap <= capleave then gotolabel("leavecave") else gotolabel("iniciocave") end
